nodes.text: The Wet Days were a recurring weather phenomenon at Port Haileap, a spaceport on the planet Haileap. During the Wet Days, it would rain non-stop for weeks, making everything damp and sticky. Jedi Padawan Imri Cantaros experienced the Wet Days during his time at Port Haileap with his Master, Douglas Sunvale. After Cantaros was stranded on the moon Wevo, he compared its acid rain to the Wet Days.
